title: 表格过宽
author: 天佑酱
txt_content:
QQ截图20200513101642.png (64.5 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-5-13 10:18 上传






如图，表格无缘无故变宽了，但是删除
give @s minecraft:dirt 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1186274438,UUIDMost:1186274438,Amount:-0.1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed,Slot:offhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:788307988,UUIDMost:788307988,Amount:20,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:offhand}],CanDestroy:["minecraft:bedrock","minecraft:saddle"]}这一段就没事了，望解答
